009package imagingbook.sampleimages;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
012
013public enum RansacTestImage implements ImageResource {
014        
015        NoisyLines("noisy-lines.png"), 
016        NoisyCircles("noisy-circles.png"), 
017        NoisyEllipses("noisy-ellipses.png");
018        
019        private static final String BASEDIR = "ransac/";
020        
021        private final String relPath;
022        
023        @Override
024        public String getRelativePath() {
025                return relPath;
026        }
027        
028        RansacTestImage(String filename) {
029                this.relPath = BASEDIR + filename;
030        }
031}
